1.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-falling-leaves
1.0.description: We present you a premium wordpress plugin which will enhance your webpage. Wordpress Falling Leaves Plugin allows you to display a falling leaves animation over your existing images or banners. You can add falling leaves animation to any image on your website with a shortcode that is added in the post or page. You can also add it to the widget. For more informations please visit: http://premiumcoding.com/wordpress-falling-leaves-plugin/
